thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: GM Human Resources Chief Leaves Company After 8 Months on Job

author: Mike Colias
title: GM Human Resources Chief Leaves Company After 8 Months on Job
text:
General Motors Co.’s human-resources chief has left the company after just eight months on the job, the auto maker said Wednesday, an unexpected move coming as the Detroit auto giant continues to seek talent to help reinvent its culture and battle Silicon Valley in an escalating tech race.
Jose Tomas, who joined GM in July 2017 after stints leading HR at health-benefits company Anthem Inc. and Burger King, “has elected to leave the company for personal reasons,” a GM spokesman said.
...
